description:
Deprecated in favor of git-flow-hooks which follows the naming convention of the project.
    
    
        Some useful hooks for [git-flow (AVH Edition)](https://chocolatey.org/packages/gitflow-avh).
        
        You can specify `/global=true` as a parameter to install git-flow hooks globally for all repositories.
        Example:  

`-params '/global=true'`
summary: Some useful hooks for git-flow (AVH Edition).
author: Jasper N. Brouwer
